original_text: Then our master, Christ, will give you a beautiful crown when he appears. That is a great gift that will never become old or less beautiful. He is the great Shepherd who takes care of us.
korean_text: 그리하면 목자장이 나타나실 때에 시들지 아니하는 영광의 관을 얻으리라

sentences.original_text: Then our master, Christ, will give you a beautiful crown
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 우리의 주이신 그리스도께서 너희에게 아름다운 관을 주실 것이다

sentences.original_text: that will never become old or less beautiful
